answers.text:
Hi Rajesh, 
Here is a resources on permitting software that will hopefully help you answer your question. You can contact the local government in this resources to learn more about the softwares that they are using. 

Best Practices for Developing and Renewing Permitting
icma.org/Documents/QuestionAnswer/Document/10607

Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Rajesh Adoni
text:
I m looking to identify at least five to six vendors that provide permitting software that allows the organization to manage the whole process.
The software could have other permitting capabilities.
Any help would be appreciated.
Thanks.
title: Encroachment Permitting Software
